Title: Wajib
Actors: Mohammad Bakri, Saleh Bakri, Tarik Kopty, Monera Shehadeh
Plot: A father and his estranged son must come together to hand deliver his daughter's wedding invitations to each guest as per local Palestinian custom, in this rousing family drama from Annemarie Jacir (When I Saw You).
Country: Palestine, France, Colombia, Germany, United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Norway
